endpoints.description: Retrieve the complete list of IT assets with their details.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific IT asset by its ID.
Add a new IT asset to the tracking system.
Update the details of a specific IT asset by its ID.
Remove an IT asset from the tracking system by its ID.
Retrieve a list of all software license details managed by the system.
Add a new software license to the tracking system.
Generate and fetch an audit report of all IT assets for compliance purposes.
Retrieve metrics and statistics on resource usage efficiency.
Set up notifications or alerts for specific IT asset management events.
